title: SOLD 1 and only price drop base ball trade card
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: SOLD 1 and only price drop base ball trade card
posts.post_content:
When I list these things it's with the intention of selling at a reasonable price point. Back on the shelf if it doesn't sell within the next week as it's an important example and I'll just go back to looking to complete the set.........

insured shipping paypal gift.

Scarce card to begin with and a CONDITION RARITY so it packs a double punch. Try and find a single type anywhere in the marketplace. From a set of four. No creases - tiny spots and head-of-a-pin sized abrasion on back bottom left. Measures about 7" x 4 1/2".

I have a couple neat items posted in the  memorabilia section. I'll be posting a few neat things..........

One and only price reduction..................
therefore this BUMP
